job description:
Data Scientist

We are looking for a data scientist with software development background. We are a rapidly growing company with small focused engineering teams that deliver innovative features to a fast growing market. We build big-data systems utilizing cutting edge technologies and solutions that allow for our engineers to continuously learn and develop while shipping amazing products.

Qualities/ Experience:
  • Self-learner, hacker, technology advocate who can work on anything
  • Amazing engineering skills, youre on your way to being the one of the best engineers you know
  • You can architect, design, code, test, and mentor others
  • Experience working with interesting and successful projects
  • Thrive in a fast growing environment
  • Excellent written and spoken English communication
  • An interest in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing, as well as modeling
RESPONSIBILITIES:

Day to Day
  • Build predictive models and or solutions for areas including text classification, entity linking, entity extraction, insight generation, predictions and trends.
  • You will collaborate with Product Development Teams to build the most effective solutions
  • You will develop features in our databases, backend apps, front end UI, and Data as a Service (DAAS) product
  • You will help architect and design large scale enterprise big-data systems
  • You will work on ideas from different team members as well as your own
  • Fix bugs rapidly
  • Attend daily stand-up meetings, planning sessions, encourage others, and collaborate at a rapid pace
EXPERIENCE & BACKGROUND:
  • BS, MS, or Ph.D. in Computer Science or related technical discipline
  • Experience Natural Language Processing, preferably in a commercial setting. Machine Learning a plus.
  • Proficient in Java (3+ years experience recommended)
  • MySQL, ElasticSearch, ESB, Hadoop, Spark, or other related data processing/database technologies
  • Experience with Amazon Web Services (EC2, S3, RDS, EMR, ELB, etc.)
  • Experience with web services using REST in Java
  • Actual coding experience in large distributed environments with multiple endpoints and complex interactions
  • Comfortable in an agile development environment
  • Understanding and have real world experience using design patterns
  • Comfortable programming on a Mac with Intellij and other tools
HG DATA CULTURE:
  • We realize were people first. Weve had minimal turnover in the past four years with a high rating on Glassdoor
  • This is a position with growth potential.
  • You will not be isolated as an Engineer; HG Data is an open and transparent company.
  • Your brain will be used, and your ideas will be implemented.
  • Our compensation and benefits are excellent, better than many startups; stock options are part of the package, but not the only part.
  • We offer a 401(k) match.
  • HG Data Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer
